content.content: Highlights of the month      Ant Alpha stETH Vault  Antalpha group, the holder of one of the world’s largest cryptocurrency mining pools, opened a stETH Vault in MakerDAO and minted over $20M DAI. This is their first interaction with Maker and will serve as a trial of what they could do in the future with it.   SG Forge  Societe Generale-Forge (SG-Forge), a subsidiary of a French multinational investment bank, has settled 7 million DAI generated from the Maker Protocol. The well know deal with SG-Forge for refinancing up to €40 worth of digitally covered bonds on its balance sheet, already took place, being the first transaction of its kind, a DeFi lending protocol was used to refinance security tokens issued by a traditional bank. As the deal has fully completed its initial goal shown on the MIP6 Application, SG-Forge also launched a PR on their website, explaining the deal to their users, meaning DeFi and MakerDAO reaching a whole new ecosystem of users. Read more here.   DSR comeback  Back in December, the Dai Savings Rate went from 0.1% to 1%. Since it was approved here on an executive vote, over 34 million DAI were supplied to the DSR contract. The comeback of one of MakerDAO’s star products opened an old path toward partnerships with many DeFi protocols and re-opened the interest of DAOs (like Olympus DAO) and treasuries to use one of DeFi’s securest yields. To increase DSR visibility, we explained how it works in this Twitter thread and the different ways to integrate it. Currently, we are in the process of integrating it into Compound and other DeFi protocols.    General updates   Business development    OKX - DAI integration: DAI was integrated into OKX Web 3.0 wallet.  Nowpayments: a crypto payment gateway. Published a Twitter thread + blog post on ten reasons you should accept payments with DAI. Thanks to their plugin integration any online store can now enable payments in crypto and accept DAI. Their partners like Travala, NGOs, and others are over 2k B2B commerce. More info here.  Coinstore: Indonesian exchange that already supports MKR, and now DAI.   Marketing and communication   Top tweets of the month    Aave + Compound D3M​:ocean: GM 2023   Centrifuge $100M DAI TVL milestone   Yearn finance proposal   Maker RWA status     Monthly Twitter report New Followers: 1,713 Monthly Impressions: 957,365 Monthly Engagements: 20,589 Avg Engagement Rate: 2.6%    Recently published articles and PR releases   Societe Generale:    Coins.FR - Société Générale expérimente la DeFi en empruntant du DAI sur MakerDAO  Finyear - Societe Generale-FORGE Completes an Initial 7 Million DAI Drawdown From MakerDAO Protocol    Marketing activations and speaker sessions   DeFi Protocols joint campaign: On Monday, February 6th, MakerDAO alongside other DeFi protocols such as Yearn Finance, Balancer, and others, participate in a joint marketing campaign across Twitter, the main social media for crypto. In this social experiment, each project was meant to tweet from each other’s accounts, reaching every user from every different dApp. This campaign showed how powerful can be the reach of every protocol if we all work together toward decentralization.    twitter.com    Maker @MakerDAO  Web3 is powered by composability and interoperability.   Our industry wins when we play to these values.  We’re proud to be one of the 30+ protocols or orgs that took part in today’s experiment in social coordination.  Decentralized, united, we win.  🤜🤛 https://t.co/ovsN1bjSEj   7:18 PM - 6 Feb 2023           140                23            During the campaign we gather over 250k impressions on all the tweets, with over 6k engagements, meaning over a 3% engagement rate, a very good and exciting numbers just for the MakerDAO account. Overall the estimated views of the campaign reach the 2.5M views aprox. with 15 pieces of coverage and reaching an audiencie of over 3.9B people. Some of the PR are:  https://thedefiant.io/defi-giants-join-forces-on-twitter-to-promote-decentralization https://www.yahoo.com/now/top-protocols-join-forces-strengthen-151910237.html https://hackernoon.com/20-defi-projects-including-balancer-aave-and-makerdao-lead-the-charge-for-decentralized-finance    Transparency Dashboard Although the Forum is the place where the Maker Community can find information about CUs, with all the flow of information, sometimes it’s hard to find all you want to know about the Growth CU. As a response to that, and as a preparation for the SES transparency tool, we created a public Notion where you will find all about our CU:  Finance Dashboard: Budget and expenses Business Development Dashboard: closed integrations Twitter Dashboard: Impression, followers, and engagement Marketing and PR Dashboard: Campaigns and press releases Brand analysts Key highlights Link to our updates in the forum let us know your thoughts @Recognized-Delegates    We want to hear from you    Share your thoughts, feedback, or tips with us in the comments below. Please use this link if you prefer to engage with us anonymously.
